alert.note: Alert for Pawnee; Richardson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 2:25PM CDT until June 05 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Richardson County in southeastern Nebraska... Eastern Pawnee County in southeastern Nebraska... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 224 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Humboldt, or 10 miles east of Pawnee City, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Table Rock and Pawnee City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
